main event: An observer reported seeing an unidentified flying object in Richmond, Indiana on March 28, 1965.
interesting points: The observer claimed the object was reddish brown in color., The sighting duration was estimated to be around 20 minutes., The object was seen continuously during the observation., The sky conditions were clear at the time of the sighting., The observer stated that the object moved behind trees during the sighting.
sighted object: reddish brown object in the sky
